title: uploaded datalad-*.tar.gz can be missing _datalad_build_support  if generated on system without setuptools_scm
body:
An [attempt](https://github.com/conda-forge/datalad-feedstock/pull/21)  to establish the build of rc for conda-forge [failed](https://dev.azure.com/conda-forge/feedstock-builds/_build/results?buildId=82465&view=logs&jobId=d0d954b5-f111-5dc4-4d76-03b6c9d0cf7e&taskId=6d4b912b-175d-51da-0fd9-4d30fe1eb4e7&lineStart=407&lineEnd=408&colStart=1&colEnd=1) due to missing `_datalad_build_support`.

<details>
<summary>indeed the tarball on pypi is missing it</summary> 

```shell
$> wget https://pypi.io/packages/source/d/datalad/datalad-0.12.0rc5.tar.gz
--2019-10-19 15:50:44--  https://pypi.io/packages/source/d/datalad/datalad-0.12.0rc5.tar.gz
Resolving pypi.io (pypi.io)... 151.101.192.223, 151.101.0.223, 151.101.128.223, ...
Connecting to pypi.io (pypi.io)|151.101.192.223|:443... connected.
HTTP request sent, awaiting response... 301 Redirect to Primary Domain
Location: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/datalad/datalad-0.12.0rc5.tar.gz [following]
--2019-10-19 15:50:44--  https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/datalad/datalad-0.12.0rc5.tar.gz
Resolving pypi.org (pypi.org)... 151.101.64.223, 151.101.128.223, 151.101.192.223, ...
Connecting to pypi.org (pypi.org)|151.101.64.223|:443... connected.
HTTP request sent, awaiting response... 301 Moved Permanently
Location: https://files.pythonhosted.org/packages/source/d/datalad/datalad-0.12.0rc5.tar.gz [following]
--2019-10-19 15:50:44--  https://files.pythonhosted.org/packages/source/d/datalad/datalad-0.12.0rc5.tar.gz
Resolving files.pythonhosted.org (files.pythonhosted.org)... 199.232.5.63, 2a04:4e42:3e::319
Connecting to files.pythonhosted.org (files.pythonhosted.org)|199.232.5.63|:443... connected.
HTTP request sent, awaiting response... 302 Found
Location: https://files.pythonhosted.org/packages/0a/06/40d90c86d34504597a589a4766bc1c392ea65d791b81cc6715ccad16cf85/datalad-0.12.0rc5.tar.gz [following]
--2019-10-19 15:50:44--  https://files.pythonhosted.org/packages/0a/06/40d90c86d34504597a589a4766bc1c392ea65d791b81cc6715ccad16cf85/datalad-0.12.0rc5.tar.gz
Reusing existing connection to files.pythonhosted.org:443.
HTTP request sent, awaiting response... 200 OK
Length: 1230959 (1.2M) [binary/octet-stream]
Saving to: ‘datalad-0.12.0rc5.tar.gz’

datalad-0.12.0rc5.tar.gz    100%[===========================================>]   1.17M  2.71MB/s    in 0.4s    

2019-10-19 15:50:45 (2.71 MB/s) - ‘datalad-0.12.0rc5.tar.gz’ saved [1230959/1230959]

$> tar -tzvf datalad-0.12.0rc5.tar.gz| grep _datalad_build_support  
```
</details>

<details>
<summary>but it is there when I just `python setup.py sdist` 0.12.0rc5 locally</summary> 

```shell
(git)hopa:~datalad/datalad-clone[tags/0.12.0rc5^0]
```
